metadata.title: CVE-2023-5680 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: If a resolver cache has a very large number of ECS records stored for thesame name, the process of cleaning the cache database node for this namecan significantly impair query performance.This issue affects BIND 9 versions 9.11.3-S1 through 9.11.37-S1, 9.16.8-S1through 9.16.45-S1, and 9.18.11-S1 through 9.18.21-S1.

criterions.comment: bind9: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
